page.title: 12A Day in a family in Banbury
page.content: Our family gets up and gets ready for work. When we are ready my mum, dad and I get in the car. It is about 7.50a.m. I get dropped off at my nan's until it is time to go to school. (My sister goes to Stanbridge so she stays at home.) Then my mum and dad carry on to work. My mum stays at work till 2 o'clock, but my dad stays till 4.30. They both work at Norbar, the tool company. When it's ten to one my mum and dad have lunch. When it's about 2 o'clock my uncle picks my mum up from work. My mum may go down town or go home. Normally she goes home. I get in about 3.30. Samantha gets in at 3.50 and my dad gets in at five o'clock. We have the dinner at about six o'clock.
